data.text: The team at The First were amazing. From the receptionist to the Management at the diner were incredible. Cris and Azurk (I think I spelled her name wrong) were very accommodating and from day one made sure I felt welcomed and maximized my experience.  My go to place whenever I am in Dubai.
data.title: Anniversary Trip 2024

data.text: The hotel is very very beautiful, very very clean! the breakfast is good and plentiful! the swimming pool is large, clean and very pretty with a large screen! The staff is very kind ! I asked for a room with a bathtub and a view from very high up, they responded to my request, I give it 10/10! Really only positive! I will come back!! Little extra: I thank Rubel for helping me with my suitcases!
data.title: Very good hotel !!!!

data.text: The Hotel is Very nice over All! What i liked the most is the kind Lifeguards at the pool especially unniðŸ˜„ i would love to get a little bit more diversiti at the restaurants because its the same everyday. All over all its a very nice hotel. We will come back
data.title: Amazing Lifeguard UnniðŸ˜„

data.text:
When I was looking for a hotel online I searched for days and days to find what would be the best place to stay , based on value and location and quality of the hotel , I wasnâ€™t sure what to expect from this hotel as the price seemed very cheap for the two weeks stay . 
I arrived at the hotel and first impressions were good , the room was big it was clean and it was new ! , you couldnâ€™t fault anything , it even had modern light switch controls by the touch of a button . The walls were spotless looked as if nobody had ever stayed in my room .  Everything you could possibly need was in the room , including wardrobes and fridge and ironing board and coffee making facilities. 
The location was a nice residential area , quiet and accessible by taxi to anywhere you need to be in 20 mins or so for a small fee . Personally the location was good for me as it felt like living in your own apartment rather than a hotel . 
The hotel offers a selection of restaurants and bars and has a very pleasant swimming pool area, as well as other facilities too , they organised a lot of excursions for me from the concierge that were all very good value and enjoyable experiences. 
For the entire duration of my stay the room was silent , and no noise from other guests , Iâ€™ve stayed in places which are 10 times the price that donâ€™t have this level of comfort . 
They even offer a free day pass to a beach club on the palm , and a free bus to get there ! . 
Completely free ! 
The value here is unbelievable, back in England you wouldnâ€™t get anything at this price of around 65 pound per night , itâ€™s so affordable and luxury too ! , my advice to anyone is to stay at this hotel and go enjoy Dubai . If you want a beach there is plenty in Dubai to go to . 
This could be one of the best hotels in Dubai at the moment and itâ€™s highly rated on here too . 
Amazing Iâ€™d definitely be returning to this amazing place .
data.title: Could this be the best hotel in Dubai ?

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
dannyd649, we're blown away by your incredible review. 

We are overjoyed to read your detailed feedback and to know that every aspect of your visit exceeded your expectations.
It brings us immense pleasure to learn that our facilities, including the modern and comfortable rooms resonated with your preferences during your time with us. 
Your acknowledgment of our efforts in maintaining a pristine environment and providing a serene atmosphere for relaxation means the world to us. We are continually striving to exceed our guests' expectations, and your words encourage us to persist in delivering exceptional hospitality. Your compliments towards our dedicated team members warm our hearts. Rest assured, we've conveyed your gratitude to them, and they are thrilled to have contributed to making your stay memorable.

We are honored to have earned your trust and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future.

Warm Regards,
George Ghaly
owner_response.author: George Ghaly

data.text: Bedroom was really nice, super comfy bed, BF was great and stuff was lovely. Rubel at reception and everyone at the pool bar and taxi service were amazing and very helpful. Pool area is really cool with big screen to watch sports. The small coffee place at reception has amazing cakes!
data.title: Great stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Irelacu,  thank you so much for your incredibly review.

We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time with us. I am glad that facilities continue to impress and that our service made you feel looked after. We strive to provide a unique and memorable experience for all of our guests and we are thrilled to hear that you appreciated our hospitality. I will be sure to pass along your kind words to Rubel, whom I know will be delighted.

We are proud to have made an impression and are looking forward to hosting you again.

Warm Regards,
George Ghaly
owner_response.author: George Ghaly
